reviewText: I have trained with Wayne for the past three years for various athletic competitions.  The first was the Golden Gloves and his coaching made a tremendous difference in my preparation.  Not only is Wayne a tremendous motivator, but his programs and techniques work.  I also used Wayne's programs to train for a Chicago Marathon and I was able to dramatically improve my time over the previous year.

I started training with Wayne Gregory back in 1997..thanks to Wayne.....I have recently opened my own gym and have over 100 members He is a great coach with a wealth of knowledge and most of all.....experience!.... A lot of coaches just "talk the talk"...Wayne "walks the walk! "
